feed.title: Davide Cruz
feed.subtitle: Molecular Modelling | Computational Biophysics | Python Development

entry.title: Beepâ€¦
entry.content:
11 years after my first post on a defunct and forgotten blog, here I am posting again. The purpose of this blog is for sharing my experience on the GSOC2018 program and all the progress and obstacles that will eventually come up along the road. There will be a lot of learning, headbanging, facepalming and, hopefully, victories during this project.

Accompany me on this journey.

Davide
